description:
i can't get pass the google calendar password request. 
it gives 401: unauthorized or something like that. the calendar has a nice feel.. but if i can't put my main calendar in there and sync it it's a no go. hope it is something fixable :D
Was looking for a calendar to import all my other calendars. It's not a very good looking one but it does the job

I run default gnome installation
1. white font on white background ! brilliant
2. not supported online accounts. simly they don't work.
It doesn't comply with my light theme, and I cannot read anything if I set the theme to light because the text is white as well.
summary: It doesn't comply with my theme
